duties_responsibilities.duty: Functional expertise in all Workbrain modules and troubleshooting skills for Workforce Management.
Designing, implementing, testing, and deploying Workbrain modules and custom APIs and functionalities.
Prototyping technical solutions with Workbrain modules and limited customization.
Good knowledge of Java fundamentals, BDD writing, Restful/SOAP web services, and SQL/database technologies.
Implementing customized solutions in Workbrain, combined with the latest tech stack.
